title: Ticket created from Playstore review aa864320-1679-4b67-8ec6-b8271c07685b
text: It has been over three years since the Flutter-based version was released, yet the app still feels very sluggish and jittery even on a flagship phone, especially during scrolling. However, I really like the fact it stores transaction history indefinitely, and doesn't hide the VPA of online merchants in transaction history, which PhonePe is notorious for. It would have been great if you could add an option to copy transaction details to clipboard.

text: One of the most unreliable apps on the store. Has given me so much pain. Online transactions fail all the time. metadata.replyContent: Sorry to about that, Katrina. To set up your card for contactless payments, open the Google Pay app, tap on the card icon at the top right of the screen, swipe to the card you want to enable and tap "verify now". Step by step instructions: g.co/help/vf39jz. If this is not the case, please contact our support team: http://goo.gle/2FoMIs9. Thanks!

title: Ticket created from Playstore review e4643673-7802-4d42-9f4b-900dd98e6d88
text: Since our last review, Google has combined its in-store, online, and person-to-person payment apps into a single offering called Google Pay. This one app handles all your transactions, instead of forcing you to use Google Pay Send for paying people and Android Pay for NFC. The app works on iOS as well as Android and the web, so it has broader appeal than both Apple Pay and Samsung Pay. Google Pay offers both NFC payment at tons of venues and smart watch support.

title: Ticket created from Playstore review 8f41b793-9879-4344-a064-6ff82e1a843f
text: After upgrading phone to Android 14, Google Pay stopped working. No errors. Just does nothing when you click final Pay button before pin is asked. Update: Google Pay makes use of org.npci.upi.security.pinactivitycomponent.GetCredential which is the point of failure. All UPI apps that use were also broken. Fixed it by clearing app data and setting the app again.

Fixed it by clearing app data and setting the app again.

Please check if you're able to send an SMS, and also ensure that the phone number you have for Google Pay is the same one that's linked with your bank account. More info: https://goo.gle/3SWE2j2. For further assistance, reach out to our support team: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc.

title: Ticket created from Playstore review 44ca9b0b-57e1-45bd-8f97-136908b210cb
text: I have done Google pay referral to my dad but I have not received the referral money yet. Even though I recharge from my dad's Google pay account, I still haven't received the referral money. Very bad user experience, so i am uninstall Google pay and remove my bank account details. It's big fraud to our customers in the through of Google pay.
